pages.text: Wa Bada Lahum Sayyi'atu Ma Kasabu Wa Haqa Bihim Ma Kanu Bihi Yastahzi'un
Fa'idha Massa Al-'Insana ƒêurrun Da`ana Thumma 'Idha Khawwalnahu Ni`matan Minna Qala 'Innama 'Utituhu `Ala `Ilmin Bal Hiya Fitnatun Wa Lakinna 'Aktharahum La Ya`lamuna
Qad Qalaha Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Fama 'Aghna `Anhum Ma Kanu Yaksibuna
Fa'asabahum Sayyi'atu Ma Kasabu Wa Al-Ladhina Zalamu Min Ha'uula' Sayusibuhum Sayyi'atu Ma Kasabu Wa Ma Hum Bimu`jizina
Awalam Ya`lamu 'Anna Allaha Yabsutu Ar-Rizqa Liman Yasha'u Wa Yaqdiru 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yu'uminuna
Qul Ya `Ibadi Al-Ladhina 'Asrafu `Ala 'Anfusihim La Taqnatu Min Rahmati Allahi 'Inna Allaha Yaghfiru Adh-Dhunuba Jami`aan 'Innahu Huwa Al-Ghafuru Ar-Rahimu
Wa 'Anibu 'Ila Rabbikum Wa 'Aslimu Lahu Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiyakumu Al-`Adhabu Thumma La Tunsaruna
Wa Attabi`u 'Ahsana Ma 'Unzila 'Ilaykum Min Rabbikum Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiyakumu Al-`Adhabu Baghtatan Wa 'Antum La Tash`uruna
An Taqula Nafsun Ya Hasrata `Ala Ma Farrattu Fi Janbi Allahi Wa 'In Kuntu Lamina As-Sakhirina
